faq.changePaymentMethod: Q. I want to change my payment method
faq.changePaymentMethodAnswer: A. You can start the payment process again from the plan selection page.
faq.cardInfoConcern: Q. I'm concerned about entering card information
faq.cardInfoConcernAnswer: A. Payment is processed securely through Stripe, used worldwide. Card information is encrypted and not stored by us.
faq.canCancelAnswer: A. Yes, you can cancel anytime. After cancellation, you can continue using Premium features until the next renewal date.
